Ryan Tomayko wrote:

>> Paul Prescod used to refer to the ability to send links around as "GET's
superpowers" :)

	Hehe. :)

>> The basic idea is solid and sending links around is absolutely one of the
greatest benefits afforded a system based on hypermedia...

Along those lines, this is one of my most hated web pages (I'm sure you can
figure out why):

	http://www.cycletrader.com/adsearch.html

-Mike Schinkel
